Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Yes. Parts delivered here from the depots
are assembled into Crafter Constructs.<sp:0:4:0>The finished products produced here are
shipped to Dragonhead Island.<sp:0:4:0>My task here is to confirm receipt of the
parts shipped from the depots.<sp:0:4:0>I then oversee the task of ensuring they
are correctly assembled.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Currently all work processes have been
suspended. As have my duties.<sp:0:4:0>The issue seems to be that no parts are
being sent from the depots.<sp:0:4:0>I am on standby here to take receipt of
them in the event that shipping resumes.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease>I will continue my work here. I eagerly
await your next visit.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>Welcome to the Construct Factory.<sp:0:4:0>I cannot remember how long it has been
since I welcomed any visitors.
